CustomField.description: Used by the AE to document any handoff notes for the CSM
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1. What's the customer's business? 2. What problems are they trying to solve? 3. How are they planning to use the Cybavo products to meet their business needs? 4. Key contacts and roles 5. Were any feature requests promised as part of closing the deal? 6. Does anyone on their team have prior experience working with Cybavo? 7. Is this a VIP or marquee customer? 8. Did we promise a testnet account? For vault only 9. Any special agreements / exceptions? 10. Any red flag
CustomField.label: Onboarding Handoff Notes_DNU
